summary: Enthusiastic junior developer passionate about real-time computer graphics, rendering algorithms, and shader programming. Skilled in C++, Python, and GLSL, with a strong focus on learning modern graphics APIs and game engine architecture. Actively contributing to open-source projects and building a solid portfolio through internships and personal experiments.

experiences.description: Assisted in integrating 2D and 3D assets into Unity scenes. Wrote small gameplay scripts in C# and optimized lighting settings for better performance.
experiences.challenge: Reduced frame time in a complex scene by adjusting shadow cascade parameters.

education.description: Specialization in computer graphics and game development. Courses include real-time rendering, GPU programming, and computational geometry.
